title: 2011 PSA World Series Finals
text: The 2011 PSA World Series Finals is the men's edition of the 2011 <a href="PSA%20World%20Series%20Finals">PSA World Series Finals</a> (Prize money : $110 000). The top 8 players in the <a href="PSA%20World%20Series%202011">PSA World Series 2011</a> were qualified for the event. The event took place at the <a href="Queen%27s%20Club">Queen's Club</a> in <a href="London">London</a> in <a href="England">England</a> between 4–8 January 2012. <a href="Amr%20Shabana">Amr Shabana</a> won his first PSA World Series Finals trophy, beating <a href="Gr%C3%A9gory%20Gaultier">Grégory Gaultier</a> in the final.
